name: unity-get-version-github-action
description: This action returns the version of Unity used in the specified project.

scripts.build: npm install && ncc build src/main.ts --license licenses.txt
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && rimraf node_modules && npm cache clean --force

author: Akio Jinsenji <akio-jinsenji@cloud-creative-studios.com> (https://github.com/akiojin)
